pattern.name: SUMUP LIST
pattern.pattern: project in (SWPL, RSP) AND issuetype in (Bug, Feature, Task, Sub-task) AND status in (OPEN, 'In Progress', Reopened, 'To Do', 'In Code Review') AND priority in (Highest, High) AND assignee in (membersOf(security)) ORDER BY cf[11903] ASC, cf[11614] ASC, status ASC, summary ASC, due ASC, priority DESC

pattern.name: SUMUP PG
pattern.pattern: labels in (PT-PM-20221031, PT-REF-20221031) AND priority in (Highest, High) AND assignee in ('pengguang.zhu') ORDER BY priority DESC
